title: How the IDO ROI Simulator Works
subtitle: Token Unlock Modeling & Risk Insights
description: Learn how the IDO ROI Simulator helps investors model token unlocks and understand the true value of their investments.

intro.title: Our Mission
intro.content: The IDO ROI Simulator was built by AlphaMind to help retail crypto investors make more informed decisions. We believe in transparency and providing tools that level the playing field.

step1.title: Enter Project Details
step1.content: Start by entering basic information about the token project including name, ticker symbol, and price.

step2.title: Define Tokenomics
step2.content: Input the token's total supply and initial circulating supply to establish baseline metrics.

step3.title: Set Up Unlock Schedule
step3.content: Create a detailed token unlock schedule to visualize how circulating supply will increase over time.

step4.title: Add Your Investment
step4.content: Enter your investment amount and token allocation to calculate your personal ROI.

step5.title: View Projections
step5.content: See projected returns under different market scenarios and plan your exit strategy accordingly.

team.title: About AlphaMind
team.content: AlphaMind is a research team dedicated to creating tools and resources for the crypto investment community. Our mission is to bring institutional-quality research and tools to retail investors.
